snippet.en: A collection of all my game jam games
snippet.zh_tw: 過去製作過的各式各樣的遊戲合集

description.en: A collection of games including a 2D and a 3D pinball platformer, a tower defense game, a generic turn-based RPG, an RTS game, a puzzle based platformer etc.
description.zh_tw: 這是我在過去幾年中製作的遊戲合集

snippet.en: 3D Pinball game where you play baseball in space
snippet.zh_tw: 在外太空打棒球的3D動作平台遊戲

description.en: Defeat the evil umpires, pitchers, and sentient gloves! Hyperrealistic Baseball III is a 3D Platformer where your goal is to get the ball to the top of the world with the help of your bat.
description.zh_tw: 打敗邪惡的裁判、投手、和手套吧！超寫實棒球III是一款以將球打擊到世界的最高處為目標的3D平台遊戲。

snippet.en: 2D Pinball game where you play baseball in space
snippet.zh_tw: 在外太空打棒球的2D彈珠台遊戲

description.en: Defeat the evil umpires, pitchers, and sentient gloves! Hyperrealistic Baseball II is a 2D Pinball Platformer where your goal is to get the ball to the top of the world with the help of your bat and oversized arm
description.zh_tw: 打敗邪惡的裁判、投手、和手套吧！超寫實棒球II是一款以將球打擊到世界的最高處為目標的2D彈射平台遊戲。

snippet.en: Cat Tower Defense where you push towers
snippet.zh_tw: 用貓推動砲塔的塔防遊戲

description.en: Build towers to hold off the enemies! Work in Progress Title Screen is a tower defense where you build and combine different parts to make cannons (and some not-cannons) to defeat enemies with different move patterns. However, towers are limited, so you have to move them from time to time in order to cover enemies from all angles.
description.zh_tw: 建造各式各樣的砲塔(和一些非砲塔)來抵抗敵人吧！半成品標題畫面是一款以各式各樣的砲塔來擊敗敵人為目標的遊戲。在砲塔有限的情況下，有時甚至需要將砲塔移動到不同的位置來抵擋各方的攻擊。

snippet.en: Ghost platformer where you explore the void
snippet.zh_tw: 幽靈探索黑暗的2D平台遊戲

description.en: Become a soul keeper! Devoid is a 2D platformer where you collect souls by exploring and solving puzzles. The game behaves like a platformer when you're in the white zone, but when you enter the black zone, you become a ghost and you are able to float freely around the stage.
description.zh_tw: 成為靈魂的管理者吧！空無是一款已收集失散於各地的靈魂為目標的2D解謎遊戲。在白色的區域中，角色的行動方式和一般的平台遊戲非常相近，而進入黑色的區域時則會進入靈體狀態，像幽靈一般的漂浮移動。

snippet.zh_tw: 需要栽培角色的回合制RPG遊戲

description.en: Grow your party and fight against evil! Flourish! is a turn based RPG where you grow your party during combat, literally. Whenever a floewer dies, they will drop seeds that can be watered and grown into a party member. Use magic to enhance your floewers and out live your enemies!
description.zh_tw: 培養花花們來對抗邪惡的勢力吧！花開！是一款需要好好「栽培」你的隊伍的回合制RPG。當花花戰敗時，他們將留下能澆水培養為更多夥伴的種子。依指數性成長，利用魔法改變夥伴的特性來獲得勝利吧。

snippet.en: An real-time strategy game about growth

description.en:
Grow your army and defend against the waves of enemies! Flourish!! Regrowth is a real time strategy game where you grow your army, literally. Whenever a floewer dies, they will drop seeds that can be watered and grown into more units. Collect resources and construct buildings to fend off the enemies! 
Made during the Tri-Campus Jam hosted by University of Washington Bothell, Seattle, and Tacoma's game development clubs, in Summer 2021. This is the last game I've made in game jams hosted by UW before I graduated. Special thanks to all the cool friends at GDC over the years! 
This is a spinoff from one of my previous games, Flourish!
description.zh_tw:
培養花花們來對抗邪惡的勢力吧！花開！！重生吧是一款需要好好「栽培」你的軍隊的即時戰略遊戲。當花花死亡時，他們將留下可以澆水培養為更多夥伴的種子。依指數性成長，收集資源，建造防禦來阻擋不斷侵襲的敵人吧。
於華盛頓大學三大校區的遊戲設計社團2021夏季舉辦的Game Jam中製作的小遊戲。這是我在從華大畢業以前參加過的最後一場Game Jam。這邊想要感謝一下這些年來我在社團中結交的好朋友們，帶給了我許多美好的回憶。
這款遊戲是之前花開的衍生作品，讓花花又再登場了一次。

description.en:
Command the swarm of rats! Cats, Explosions, and Extra Cheese is a 2D top down nibbler where you make things explode with rats. Nibble down the cheese you get from defeating enemies and grow your rat army! 
Made during the University of Washington Game Development Club's rat themed game jam in Summer 2020. 
Despite the fact that I like drawing cute anime girls, this is about the only game I've made that features cute anime girls.
description.zh_tw:
指揮鼠鼠們吧！貓、爆炸、與加倍起司是一款2D的啃啃遊戲。指揮不斷地增加的鼠鼠們把地圖裡的所有東西都吃爆吧。
於華盛頓大學遊戲設計社團2020夏季舉辦的Game Jam中製作的小遊戲。
雖然我平常就很喜歡畫日系的美少女，不過這大概是我唯一做過有日系少女的一款遊戲。

snippet.zh_tw: 自殺性機器人射擊遊戲

description.en:
Help a robot who crash landed on a strange planet, and needs to rebuild its ship to get home! Priklepal is a 2D top-down shooter game where you must avoid the projectiles you launch yourself. 
 Made during the University of Washington Game Development Club's prickly themed game jam in Fall 2018. This is my first game jam and the game is the first game I've ever "finished" making.
description.zh_tw:
幫助不幸失事墜落到了奇異星球的機器人重建火箭來回到家鄉吧！普利克帕是一款必須要避開自己發射的彈幕的2D射擊遊戲。
於華盛頓大學遊戲設計社團2018秋季舉辦的Game Jam中製作的小遊戲。這是我第一次參加Game Jam，也是我第一次真正完成一款遊戲。
